nodes.text: The Jagged Plains was the crystal-strewn plain that made up most of the eastern Clabburn Tundra on the planet Hoth. The Jagged Plains was bordered on its north edge by the Buried Field, and the Republic Military maintained Jagged Plains Republic Outpost on the western edge of the area. The Kintan crusher Gargath lived in the area known as Gargath's Watch on the plains.
